name: Brachio Bomber

trigger.text: Add 1 DON!! card from your DON!! deck and set it as active.

text: Main: K.O. 1 of your opponent's Characters with a cost of 6 or less, then add 1 DON!! card from your DON!! deck and set it as active. Trigger: Add 1 DON!! card from your DON!! deck and set it as active.

effect.text: K.O. 1 opponent Character with cost 6 or less, then add 1 DON!! from DON deck set active.
